verbose_text: Together, our results indicate that although activation of DAF-16 was not capable of suppressing the fertility defect of late generation prg-1 mutants (XREF_FIG), that activation of DAF-16 in early generations abolishes the prg-1 mutant fertility defect (XREF_FIG) and that an endogenous DAF-16-mediated RNAi pathway can restore fertility to sterile 5-day-old prg-1 mutant adults in response to bacteria grown on RNAi plates.
evidence: DAF-16 in early generations abolishes the prg-1
